pageProduct.name: Paedamin Decongestant Antihistamine Liquid 200mL
pageProduct.description:
Information

** THIS PRODUCT CAN NO LONGER BE SOLD FOR CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE 6 YEARS **

General Information

Children's Paedamin Decongestant and Antihistamine Oral Liquid is fast temporary relief from cold and allergy symptoms: Runny nose, sneezing, itchy, watery eyes and nasal congestion. With oral dosing device included.

Uses
Children's Paedamin Decongestant and Antihistamine provides fast relief from the following symptoms of colds and allergies: runny nose, sneezing, itchy watery eyes and nasal congestion.

The antihistamine (Diphenhydramine hydrochloride) helps dry a runny nose and relieves sneezing and itchy, watery eyes. The decongestant (Phenylephrine hydrochloride) helps to relieve nasal and sinus congestion making breathing easier.

- Plastic bottle.
- Child resistant cap.

Suitable For: Children 6-12 years.

Product Claims: Colour free, sugar free, alcohol free, gluten free.

Boxed Contents: Oral liquid and oral dosing device included.

Size: 200mL

Alcohol Free?: Yes

Warnings

Do not give to children under 6 years of age.
Use in children aged 6 to 11 years only on the advice of a doctor, pharmacist or nurse practitioner.
Do not take while breastfeeding.

Speak with your doctor if you are pregnant or likely to become pregnant, have high blood pressure, heart problems or are taking antidepressant medication.

If symptoms persist for more than 48 hours or are accompanied by high temperature, consult your doctor.

Do not exceed the recommended dose. If an overdose is taken or suspected, ring the Poisons Information Centre (Australia 13 11 26) or go to a hospital immediately.

This medication may cause drowsiness. If affected do not drive a vehicle or operate machinery.

Avoid alcohol.

Contains Saccharin sodium, Sodium benzoate, Hydroxybenzoates and 10.5 g Sorbitol per maximum adult daily dose which may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea.

CAUTION

Pharmacy medicine.
Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Contains: in 1mL Diphenhydramine hydrochloride 2.5mg Phenylephrine hydrochloride 500microgram
Saccharin sodium, Sodium benzoate, Hydroxybenzoates and 10.5 g Sorbitol

Active Ingredients: Contains: in 1mL
Diphenhydramine hydrochloride 2.5mg
Phenylephrine hydrochloride 500microgram

Contains: Saccharin sodium, Sodium benzoate, Hydroxybenzoates and 10.5 g Sorbitol

Allergen Free From: Gluten| Sugar

Directions

Directions for use of the dosing syringe
To withdraw an accurate dose, insert the dosing syringe into the bottle and draw liquid up to the required measurement line. Check dosage is correct. Gently press the plunger down to release the liquid into your child's mouth. Wash after each use.

Dosage
Recommended Dosage 6-8 hourly as necessary.
Age 6-8 years; Bodyweight 20-23kg; Dose 7.0 - 8.0mL
Age 8-10 years; Bodyweight 23-28kg; Dose 8.0 - 10mL
Age 10-12 years; Bodyweight 28-41kg; Dose 10 - 15mL

Adults and children over 12 years: 15mL every 6 hours when necessary.

USAGE ADVICE

Use only if the cap seal is intact at first opening.
To close the child resistant cap, tighten until the cap clicks when reopening is attempted.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C. Protect from light.

Storage Temperature: Store below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Recyclable.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
